input: Context: thanks for contacting acme.  how may i help you today? i'm looking at a pair of boots on your website and the size i want says unavailable. oh, i'm sorry to hear that.  let me see what i can do i may be able to help with this, may i ask your full name and account id before we begin? norman bouchard i might not be able to find the item for you, but i should still be able to let our purchasing department know what it is that you were looking for i don't have my account id

input: Context: thanks for contacting acme.  how may i help you today? i'm looking at a pair of boots on your website and the size i want says unavailable. oh, i'm sorry to hear that.  let me see what i can do i may be able to help with this, may i ask your full name and account id before we begin? norman bouchard i might not be able to find the item for you, but i should still be able to let our purchasing department know what it is that you were looking for i don't have my account id ah, that shouldn't be a problem, i can see your account now, mr. bouchard i'm looking for the michael kors boots in a size 9 okay, i have notified our purchasing department about the missing items, and hopefully they can do a better job next time. ok thank you.  will they notify me if they are in stock? i'm sorry we couldn't have that item available for you.  they should notify you when it is in stock, or, if you'd prefer i can put in a back-order for you? yes, please put it on backorder if i place the order for you now, it would ship automatically as soon as we get it in, if that's okay that is fine. excellent, if you would like to use the same credit card that we already have on file, i can do that for you right now yes please

Context: hi, how can i help you i am very upset with this company. sorry this has happened how can i help well, i see a charge on my billing statement that was supposed to have been reversed. i sent the darn jeans back already!!! what is the charge for? $<amount>.00 so you returned jeans and didn't get the credit you were supposed to get? exactly.  finally someone is actually helping me! sorry this happened. i should be able to help can i have your full name or account id please? did you lay off agents because of the virus? we have had to move many agents to work at home status, so there are some problems people have to get used to the software at home i am sorry to hear that. norman bouchard

Context: hi, how can i help you i am very upset with this company. sorry this has happened how can i help well, i see a charge on my billing statement that was supposed to have been reversed. i sent the darn jeans back already!!! what is the charge for? $<amount>.00 so you returned jeans and didn't get the credit you were supposed to get? exactly.  finally someone is actually helping me! sorry this happened. i should be able to help can i have your full name or account id please? did you lay off agents because of the virus? we have had to move many agents to work at home status, so there are some problems people have to get used to the software at home i am sorry to hear that. norman bouchard yes, it's a good company though so they are trying not to fire anyone ok, i need to look up your order. can i have your username, email and order id? well, if you can help me, then i will send an email to your supervisor telling them how great you were. i hope i can help you then! <username> <email> <order_id>

Context: hi, how can i help you i am very upset with this company. sorry this has happened how can i help well, i see a charge on my billing statement that was supposed to have been reversed. i sent the darn jeans back already!!! what is the charge for? $<amount>.00 so you returned jeans and didn't get the credit you were supposed to get? exactly.  finally someone is actually helping me! sorry this happened. i should be able to help can i have your full name or account id please? did you lay off agents because of the virus? we have had to move many agents to work at home status, so there are some problems people have to get used to the software at home i am sorry to hear that. norman bouchard yes, it's a good company though so they are trying not to fire anyone ok, i need to look up your order. can i have your username, email and order id? well, if you can help me, then i will send an email to your supervisor telling them how great you were. i hope i can help you then! <username> <email> <order_id> okay, do you know how many days it's been since you received the refund? i never received a refund.  that's why i'm calling. sorry, since you were supposed to receive the credit it's been 3 days. okay, that's good news. what membership level are you? i'm just a guest.  membership levels are too over-priced imho. i understand, they are pretty expensive okay, it is expected to take up to 7 days for the credit to go into your account. i can't issue you the credit now, because you would likely end up with two credits when the other one goes through the credit should show up within the next four days! okay.  so then i need to wait. yes, unfortunately that's all you can do at this time. sorry for the delay
